definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: Sorry, your styling mousse is included in the category of combustibles .
sentences.chinese: 对不起，您的定型摩丝属于易燃品。

sentences.english: This gas is also what causes the liquid mousse to turn all foamy.
sentences.chinese: 这些气体还可以将液态状的摩丝转换成泡沫状。

sentences.english: Silly string is illegal in the city limits.
sentences.chinese: 在市界内，喷彩摩丝是违法的。

sentences.english: The mousse helps shape my hair.
sentences.chinese: 那摩丝可以帮助塑造我的发型。

sentences.english: And hairspraycan, it seems, be used in 12 very different ways.
sentences.chinese: 而摩丝似乎有12种不同用法。

sentences.english: B:The mousse helps shape my hair.
sentences.chinese: 那摩丝可以帮助塑造我的发型。

sentences.english: Chef Bernard Henry dishes out his outrageously good pear mousse.
sentences.chinese: 伯纳德亨利菜厨师竟然好了他的梨摩丝。

sentences.english: I put some mousse on my hair.
sentences.chinese: 我在头发上抹了些摩丝。

sentences.english: Then you could give styling to it with mousse.
sentences.chinese: 然后你可以用摩丝给自己定型。
